name: Poopy Pipes
description:
Poopy Pipes is a challenging puzzle game that tests your strategic thinking and problem-solving skills. The objective of the game is to connect various pieces of pipe together to create a complete pipeline that runs from the starting point to the end point.

The game features multiple levels of increasing difficulty, each with a unique layout of pipes that you must connect in the correct order to successfully complete the level. As you progress through the levels, you'll encounter obstacles such as dead ends, corners, and limited space, which will make it more challenging to connect the pipes correctly.

To play the game, simply click the pipe pieces from the side of the screen onto the game board to connect them with the existing pipes. You'll need to place the pieces as necessary to ensure that the flow of the pipeline is uninterrupted and that there are no leaks.

As you complete each level, you'll earn points and unlock new levels with even more challenging layouts. The game also features a high-score leaderboard, so you can compete against other players for the top spot.

Overall, Poopy Pipes is an addictive and engaging puzzle game that will keep you entertained for hours as you strategize and solve each level's unique challenges.
